LanguageData.HSHokorathought.stages.0.label: Blessed by Minor Kami
LanguageData.HSHokorathought.stages.0.description: The Minor Kami that is enshrined in our Hakora protects us from evil, I feel a little safer being near it.
LanguageData.HSAteDango.stages.0.label: ate Dango
LanguageData.HSAteDango.stages.0.description: I ate Dango. Even plain it still tasted pretty good.
LanguageData.HSAteAdzukiBeanPaste.stages.0.label: ate adzuki bean paste
LanguageData.HSAteAdzukiBeanPaste.stages.0.descriptio: I ate adzuki bean paste, its sweet and delicious.
ate food with Adzuki Bean Paste
The food I ate was sweetened with Aduzki bean paste, it tasted good.
LanguageData.HSAteAdzukiDango.stages.0.label: ate Adzuki Dango
LanguageData.HSAteAdzukiDango.stages.0.description: I ate Dango. The sweet Adzuki bean paste made it taste so good!
